short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension highlighting Bootstrap deprecated classes in websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bootstrap Deprecated Classes Extension allows developers to easily spot old Bootstrap deprecated classes in a website by highlighting where they are used with colored borders and backgrounds, and by showing their name in the page. It is particularly useful while migrating to the latest version of Bootstrap.
